turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I just got paid, but my balance doesn't look quite right. Can you tell me what my current checking account balance is?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can help you with that. For security purposes, could you please provide the last four digits of your checking account number?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's XXXX. And actually, while I have you, I noticed a strange charge last week for $50 labeled 'Online Purchase'. I didn't make any online purchase of that amount. What is this charge, and how can I dispute it? This is really frustrating.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for confirming the account details. I can see the charge you're referring to. Transactions are typically posted with merchant information. To dispute a transaction, you would need to fill out a dispute form, which can be found on our website's support section. We'll investigate the charge once the form is submitted.
